statements: SELECT * FROM transportation_routes;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM transportation_routes WHERE distance_km > 100;
SELECT route_id, route_name, transport_mode FROM transportation_routes WHERE schedule_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '14:00:00';
SELECT * FROM transportation_routes ORDER BY route_name DESC;
SELECT route_name, distance_km, eco_friendly FROM transportation_routes WHERE transport_mode = 'Train';
SELECT * FROM transportation_routes WHERE distance_km > 100 ORDER BY route_name DESC
SELECT route_id, route_name, start_location, schedule_time FROM transportation_routes WHERE transport_mode = 'bus'
SELECT route_name, distance_km FROM transportation_routes WHERE eco_friendly = TRUE AND transport_mode = 'train' ORDER BY distance_km ASC
SELECT route_name AS Route, start_location AS 'Start', end_location AS 'End' FROM transportation_routes WHERE eco_friendly = FALSE
SELECT * FROM transportation_routes WHERE schedule_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '18:00:00' ORDER BY route_id
SELECT * FROM Routes;
SELECT route_name, distance, start_location, end_location FROM Routes;
SELECT route_id, route_name FROM Routes ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT route_name FROM Routes WHERE distance > 100;
SELECT * FROM Schedules WHERE departure_time < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Routes WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY route_name DESC;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM Routes WHERE start_location='City A' AND end_location='City B';
SELECT route_id, route_name, distance, start_location, end_location FROM Routes WHERE distance BETWEEN 50 AND 150 ORDER BY route_id ASC;
SELECT R.route_name, S.departure_time, S.arrival_time FROM Routes R JOIN Schedules S ON R.route_id = S.route_id WHERE S.departure_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY S.departure_time ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_routes, AVG(distance) AS average_distance FROM Routes;
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT origin_city, destination_city FROM routes WHERE distance > 1000;
SELECT route_id, origin_city, destination_city FROM routes ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE departure_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY departure_time ASC;
SELECT company_name, is_ecofriendly FROM logistics_companies WHERE is_ecofriendly = true;
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE origin_city = 'New York' AND distance > 500
SELECT route_id, origin_city, destination_city FROM routes ORDER BY destination_city ASC
SELECT * FROM logistics_companies WHERE is_ecofriendly = TRUE
SELECT route_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM schedules WHERE departure_time >= '2022-08-15' ORDER BY departure_time ASC
SELECT r.route_id, r.origin_city, r.destination_city, s.departure_time FROM routes r JOIN schedules s ON r.route_id = s.route_id
SELECT * FROM routes ORDER BY route_id ASC;
SELECT start_location, end_location, distance FROM routes WHERE start_location='City A';
SELECT schedule_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM schedules WHERE schedule_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, max_capacity FROM vehicles WHERE max_capacity > 50 ORDER BY vehicle_id DESC;
SELECT assignment_id, schedule_id, vehicle_id, assigned_quantity FROM assignments WHERE actual_quantity < assigned_quantity;
SELECT * FROM routes ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT start_location, end_location, distance FROM routes WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY distance ASC, route_id ASC;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, distance FROM routes WHERE end_location = 'City A' AND start_location = 'City B';

SELECT r.route_id, r.start_location, r.end_location, s.departure_time, s.arrival_time, v.vehicle_type, a.assigned_quantity FROM routes r JOIN schedules s ON r.route_id = s.route_id JOIN vehicles v ON v.vehicle_id = a.vehicle_id JOIN assignments a ON a.schedule_id = s.schedule_id WHERE v.vehicle_type = 'Bus' ORDER BY r.route_id DESC;
SELECT route_id, end_location, distance FROM routes WHERE distance BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY distance ASC;
SELECT * FROM Routes;
SELECT route_id, destination FROM Routes ORDER BY distance ASC;
SELECT customer_name, contact_number FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, capacity FROM Vehicles WHERE emission_level = 'GREEN';
SELECT * FROM Schedules WHERE departure_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM Vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, capacity FROM Vehicles WHERE emission_level = 'Low';
SELECT origin, destination, distance FROM Routes ORDER BY origin ASC, distance DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, emission_level FROM Vehicles WHERE capacity > 50 ORDER BY vehicle_type ASC;
SELECT customer_name, contact_number FROM Customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM Orders WHERE delivery_status = 'Delivered');
